Companion Spawning
Maximum number of wanderers in town
The maximum number of wanderers that can be in a town at once. Expect lag/temporary freezes if you set a high number.
Auto-refresh Wanderers weekly
Automatically deletes old wanderers and spawn new wanderers at the start of every week. Will cause freezes every in-game week!
Refresh Wanderers
Press to refresh
Removes all current unhired wanderers and spawn new ones. MAY CAUSE TEMPORARY FREEZE, NO NEED TO WORRY! :D
Cleanup Wanderers [Uninstallation]
Press to remove dead wanderers from game
Removes all dead wanderers from game.
Gift Settings
Gift Cooldown (Days)
The minimum time interval (days) before you can give another gift to the same person.
Wanderer Join Request
Wanderer Request Cooldown (Days)
The minimum time interval (days) before you can receive another request for a clan member to join.
Chance of Wanderer Request per Clan Tier
The chance of receiving a request per tier. If your clan tier is 3, the chance of receiving a request is 3x of the value your provided.
